DOC.brief_summary: A crossover trial healthy volunteer conduct . Six session perform week counterbalance order least seven day washout period minimize carry-over effect . In session , volunteer submit : fatigue attention level evaluation , cortical brain activity measure pair pulse transcranial magnetic stimulation ( pp-TMS ) , handwrite test , non-invasive cerebellar stimulation serial reaction time task ( SRTT ) performance perception evaluation .
DOC.detailed_description: After give prior informed consent , volunteer submit six pseudo-randomized session use website ( randomization.com ) non-involved researcher . At study beginning , volunteer evaluate structured questionnaire baseline SRTT perform 24 hour first session . Each session , comprise follow experimental sequence : 1 . Fatigue attention level . It measure analogue scale grade 0 10 , 0 mean low fatigue attention level 10 , high fatigue attention level . 2 . Short intracortical inhibition ( SICI ) intracortical facilitation ( ICF ) : evaluate pp-TMS paradigm ( Neurosoft , Russia ) . Initially , rest motor threshold ( RMT ) determine find low stimulator output elicit motor evoke potential ( MEP ) around 50 μV ( TMS Motor Threshold Assessment Tool -MTAT 2.0 - USA ) . For RMT measure , figure-eight coil connect magnetic stimulator hold manually 45 degree midline , place right primary motor cortex ( C4 - 10/20 System ) . Subthreshold conditioning stimulus ( 80 % RMT ) suprathreshold test stimulus ( 120 % RMT ) deliver interstimulus interval ( ISI ) 2 millisecond SICI 10 millisecond ICF . Ten stimuli apply condition ( unconditioned pulse pair stimuli ISI 2 10 millisecond ) . Stimuli order delivery pseudo-randomized SICI ICF express conditioned stimulus percentage regard unconditioned stimulus . 3 . Handwriting test : volunteer instruct write six word digital pen use non-dominant hand tablet provide analysis software system ( MovAlyzer , EUA ) . The task perform spontaneously , without instruction bias write activity . Each session different word sequence difficulty level maintain ( six word , two 4 , 6 8 letter ) . 4 . Non-invasive cerebellar stimulation + Serial Reaction Time Task : Cerebellar stimulation apply SRTT ( online acquisition ) . ctDCS - Electrical current deliver DC stimulator ( NeuroConn Plus , Germany ) use pair saline-soaked sponge electrode ( surface 25cm² 35cm² ) . Low frequency protocol : 1Hz , 110 % RMT , 1000 stimulus ( 1 train ) . High frequency protocol : 10Hz , 110 % RMT , 33 train , 50 stimulus per train , intertrain interval 25 second , 1650 stimulus . DOC.criteria: Righthanded ( assessed Edinburgh Handedness Inventory ) Healthy volunteer ( self report ) Absence neurological psychiatric diseases No history severe musculoskeletal injury wrist finger Without use drug neuroactive substance regularly Pregnancy Presence metallic implant close target stimulation area Acute eczema target stimulation area Pacemaker History seizures epilepsy Hemodynamic instability
